Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: UOB Prvi Miles Platinum American Express Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Complimentary 1-way limousine transfer to Changi Airport and travel insurance. Bonus 20,000 miles and waiver on annual fee with minimum S$50,000 annual spend.

Fastest earn rate - 3 miles for every S$1 spent on Singapore Airlines, SilkAir and KrisShop, 2.4 miles for every S$1 spent overseas and 1.4 miles for every S$1 spent locally, with no minimum spend. Plus, choice to redeem from over 40 airlines, cash or travel packages.
Receive a Samsonite Engenero Spinner 69cm Luggage worth S$560 when you apply now!

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 1. 8,000 air miles for New UOB card applicants OR
2. 5,000 air miles for existing UOB cardholders applying for PRVI Miles Credit Cards

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Promotion limited to first 1,000 successful applicants who spend a min. of S$1,500 within the first month.
2. Qualified Applicants who have never been issued any UOB credit cards shall be entitled to 8,000 air miles.
3. Qualified Applicants who have active UOB cards issued to them shall be entitled to 5,000 air miles.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver
Annual Interest Rate/ APR

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Complimentary limousine is applicable to UOB PRVI Miles American Express Cardmembers only. Please make the limousine booking at least 2 days prior to travel date.

Samsonite Engenero Spinner 69cm Luggage applicable to cards approved from 1 October - 31 December 2015 and not applicable to existing UOB PRVI Miles Cardmembers. Promotion is limited to first 300 successful card applicants in each qualifying period, who make a minimum spend of S$3,000 within a month from card approval date.

Cardmembers will earn UNI$7.5 for every S$5 spent at Singapore Airlines, SilkAir and KrisShop (equivalent to 3 miles for every S$1 spent), UNI$6 for every S$5 spent on transactions in foreign currencies (equivalent to 2.4 miles for every S$1 spent) and UNI$3.5 for every S$5 spent on transactions in Singapore Dollars (equivalent to 1.4 miles for every S$1 spent).

Details.Name: sc_airmiles_details
Details.Feature: $1 = 1.4 miles (local spend)
$1 = 2.4 miles (overseas spend)
Earn 3 miles every S$1 spent on Singapore Airlines, SilkAir & KrisShop
Bonus 20,000 miles with spend of $50,000 in a year
Personal accident and travel inconvenience insurance coverage of up to S$1,000,000
Rebate of S$45 for each one-way limousine service to Singapore Changi Airport with min. overseas spend of S$1,000 within each qualifying quarter
